selectTicketType: Please select the type of ticket you want to create:
welcomeMsg: Please wait for a staff member to assist you. Once the issue is resolved, you or a staff member can close the ticket with the button below. If you believe only Admins should view this ticket (due to confidentiality, etc.) you can use the Admin Only button below.

adminOnly.request: has requested to make this ticket Admin Only.

transcriptDelete.error1: Error deleting the transcript txt file!

setup.successUpdate: The setup channel was updated to

typeEdit.optionDescrp: Select the ticket type to edit
typeEdit.noTypes: No custom ticket types found! Create one with `/ticket type-add` first.

typeToggle.optionDescrp: Select the ticket type to toggle

typeDefault.optionDescrp: Select the ticket type to set as default
typeDefault.success: **{0}** is now the default ticket type!
typeDefault.error: Failed to set default ticket type!
typeDefault.mustBeActive: Cannot set an inactive ticket type as default!

userRestrict.cmdDescrp: Manage user restrictions for ticket types
userRestrict.optionType: Ticket type (optional - opens configurator if not specified)
userRestrict.title: User Ticket Restrictions
userRestrict.description: Manage which ticket types {user} can create
userRestrict.noTypes: No custom ticket types found! Create one with `/ticket type-add` first.
userRestrict.confirmRestrict: Are you sure you want to **restrict** {user} from creating **{type}** tickets?
userRestrict.confirmAllow: Are you sure you want to **allow** {user} to create **{type}** tickets again?
userRestrict.alreadyRestricted: {user} is already restricted from creating **{type}** tickets.
userRestrict.notRestricted: {user} is not restricted from creating **{type}** tickets.
userRestrict.notYourInteraction: You cannot interact with this message.
userRestrict.footer: Click a ticket type to toggle restriction

settings.adminOnlyMentionEnabled: Staff will be **pinged** when a ticket creator requests admin-only.
settings.adminOnlyMentionDisabled: Staff will **not be pinged** when a ticket creator requests admin-only.
settings.pingOnCreateEnabled: Staff will be **pinged** when a **{0}** ticket is created.
settings.pingOnCreateDisabled: Staff will **not be pinged** when a **{0}** ticket is created.
settings.typeRequired: You must specify a ticket type for this setting!
